Description: The script - Alexander Galich, Stephen Tsanev.

Based on the novel by Alexander Grin.

Pianist Harvey heading on tour, coming off the train to buy cigarettes, and asks the salesgirl that fictional writer Alexander Grin cities exist in reality - a 30-minute bus ride away. Forgetting about the tour, he went to a city where he met with the captain of a sailboat "Running on waves" ...
